ONTARI ALBERT MANITOB SASKATCHEWA QUEBE NEW
ON TARI Man I to. BALBERT, SASKATCHEWAN Ova Scot I British
MY Uncle Albert, a funny man, workS AT SCOTIA BANK in the rural town OF NOVA
MY BRitish, COLUMBIA-JACKET CIGAR-SMOKING UNCLE ONCE MET Prince Edward, ON AN ISLAND
